LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayoneOnlineBankTransfer
LocaleResource.Value: Payone online bank transfer through SOFORT Überweisung, Giropay etc.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayoneFinancingBillsafe
LocaleResource.Value: Payone purchase on account with BillSAFE

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayoneFinancingKlarna
LocaleResource.Value: Payone purchase on account with Klarna

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
Instructions to set up Payone:

  1. Sign up in the merchant area of Payone.
  2. Create a new sub account under configuration > account. Enter the sub account ID on this page below.
  3. Create a new portal under configuration > payment portal. You use your store URL and activate the channels FinanceGate Frontend and FinanceGate Server-API.
  4. Go to the Advanced tab. There enter the Success, Back and TransactionStatus URLs listed below on this page.
  5. Enter the data displayed under API parameters on this page in the fields provided for this purpose.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstructionCss
LocaleResource.Value:
Tip: You can customize the appearance of the Payone payment page as follows:

  1. Go to the Payone merchant area to configuration > account and open the Advanced tab.
  2. Select the language of the template and replace the CSS statements between the following lines
    <style type="text/css" media="screen"><!--
    and
    --></style>
  3. For example try out the following CSS: Show
form[name=paymentform] > table {
	width: 640px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	font-size: 0.9em;
}
table {
	width: 100%;
}
td {
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Geneva, SunSans-Regular;
	padding: 3px 0 3px 0;
}
input {
	padding: 3px 4px 2px 4px;
}
input[type=text] {
	width: 280px;
}
input[type=radio] {
	margin-right: 50px;
}
select {
	width: 292px;
	padding: 4px 0 4px 0;
}
input.short {
	width: 132px !important;
}
select.short {
	float: none !important;
	width: 144px !important;
}
input.submit {
	width: auto;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: #fff;
	padding: 6px 12px;
	background-color: #7F7B73;
	cursor: pointer;
	border: 1px solid #f0f0f0;
	border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
}
input.submit:hover {
	background-color: #615D55;
}
input.submit[disabled] {
	color: gray;
	cursor: wait;
}
a {
	color: #000;
}
a:hover {
	color: #F79400;
}
.fullbox {
	width: 640px;
	background-color: #E3DFD7;
	padding: 0 10px 0 10px;
}
.headbox {
	width: 100%;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: white;
	background-color: #7F7B73;
	margin: 20px 0 10px 0;
	border-radius: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
}
#submitFormBox {
	width: 100%;
}
#infoFormBox {
	width: 99%;
}
#infoFormBox td {
	font-size: 0.9em;
}
#language {
	font-size: 0.8em !important;
	width: 120px !important;
	margin-right: 3px;
}
.footer {
	height: 26px;
}
.stripline {
	border-top: 1px solid #999;
	padding-top: 5px;
}
.errortext {
	color: #c00;
}

LocaleResource.Name: MessageStrings
LocaleResource.Value: Status;Payment method;Failure reason;Portal ID;Subaccount ID;Transaction ID;Transaction start;Expires on;Reference number;Sequence number;Offer ID;Access ID;Order GUID;Currency;Amount;Total amount;Balance;Payone User ID;Customer ID;Credit card;Credit card expiration;Credit card holder;Bank;Account number;Account holder;IBAN;BIC;Mandate ID;Creditor ID;Clearing amount;Clearing date;Due date;Financing reference;Invoice;IP address

LocaleResource.Name: FailureReasons
LocaleResource.Value: Insufficient funds.;Account expired;Account no./name not identical, incorrect or savings account.;No direct debit.;Recall. The recipient of the payment recalls the direct debit order.;Objection. The payer objects to the direct debit.;Return. The executing bank returns the order (due to insufficient funds, account closure, decease of the account holder, ...).;Debit cannot be collected.;Credit card chargeback;Credit card cannot be collected

LocaleResource.Name: OrderNotFound
LocaleResource.Value: An order for a transaction status message was not found ({0}).

LocaleResource.Name: InvalidCredentials
LocaleResource.Value: The access data to the payment provider are incomplete. Please enter the necessary credentials in the configuration area of the payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: MissingCheckoutSessionState
LocaleResource.Value: Missing checkout session state for Payone. Your payment cannot be processed. Please go back to the payment selection and checkout again.

LocaleResource.Name: TransactionTypeNotSupported
LocaleResource.Value: The transaction type is not supported by Payone for the current settings.

LocaleResource.Name: BillingAndShippingAddressMustBeEqual
LocaleResource.Value: Shipping and billing address seem to differ. Both addresses must be equal for the selected payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: OnlyEnterPaymentDataInCheckout
LocaleResource.Value: The option to enter payment data in checkout must be activated. Another setting is not supported by Payone.

LocaleResource.Name: InvalidIp
LocaleResource.Value: Received payone notification from invalid IP address ({0}).

LocaleResource.Name: ContactPayoneNote
LocaleResource.Value: For this message contacting Payone is recommended. A change may be needed on your Payone account to perform the corresponding function.

LocaleResource.Name: NowRedirecting
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to Payone...

LocaleResource.Name: SuccessUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter this URL in your payment portal at Payone.

LocaleResource.Name: BackUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter this URL in your payment portal at Payone.

LocaleResource.Name: TransactionStatusUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter this URL in your payment portal at Payone. Your shop will then receive status messages of the payment transactions.

LocaleResource.Name: PortalId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: ID of the Payone payment portal to be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SubAccountId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: ID of the Payone sub-account to be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SecurityKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The security key of the Payone payment portal to be used.

LocaleResource.Name: UseSandbox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the box to use the test system.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: TransactionType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines when the payout should occur.

LocaleResource.Name: AddOrderNotes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines that order notes should be created in context of the data exchange with the payment provider.

LocaleResource.Name: EnterPaymentDataInCheckout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines that the customer enters its payment data (e.g. credit card details) during checkout. If this option is disabled, then he is redirected to Payone (after ordering) to enter payment data there.

LocaleResource.Name: CheckIp.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Security mechanism to ensure that responses are always from the Payone server.

LocaleResource.Name: IbanRequired
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter the IBAN (International Bank Account Number).

LocaleResource.Name: BicRequired
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter the BIC (Bank Interchange Code).

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedCreditCards.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Credit cards that customers may not pay with.

LocaleResource.Name: IssueNumber.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Issue number of your credit card. Only required for british Maestro cards.

LocaleResource.Name: PseudoCardPanValidation
LocaleResource.Value: Your credit card data was not validated by Payone. Please enter your data again or select another payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedOnlineBankTransferTypes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Payment methods that customers may not pay with.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSepaMandate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines to create a SEPA direct mandate that must be confirmed by the customer.

LocaleResource.Name: SepaMandateDescription
LocaleResource.Value: To directly debit your account we need a SEPA direct mandate from you.

LocaleResource.Name: ConfirmSepaMandate
LocaleResource.Value: I would like to give the mandate (electronic transmission)

LocaleResource.Name: ConfirmSepaMandate.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Please confirm the SEPA direct mandate.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: CheckoutCompleteIntro
LocaleResource.Value: Please transfer the total due in the amount of {0} to the following account:

LocaleResource.Name: CheckoutCompleteNote
LocaleResource.Value: Please keep in mind that we can take into account only transfers with the correct intended purpose!

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Value: Please transfer the total due in the amount of {0} to the following account:

LocaleResource.Value: Please keep in mind that we can take into account only transfers with the correct intended purpose!

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: PaymentFeeWarning
LocaleResource.Value: The calculation of additional fees is only possible after consultation with BillSAFE.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: After confirmation of the order, you will be redirected straight to Payone. Please provide your data for online banking.

LocaleResource.Name: DateOfBirth.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter your complete birth date.

LocaleResource.Name: ConfirmDataTransmit
LocaleResource.Value:
With selecting Klarnas payment method I agree with the submission of data required for the processing, authentication and credit assessment at Klarna. I can withdraw my consent at any time with effect for the future.

For further information of purchase on account see invoice terms.

LocaleResource.Name: ConfirmDataTransmit.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: You must confirm the transmission of your data to Klarna.
